title: How long does riot support take to respond?
body: I by accidentally scratched off my code of my card and i am waiting for a reponse and i am rlly unpatient rn , sry. But i wish riot had the same prepaid cade damaged or unreadable support, beacause these cards gettting destroyed happen to me constantly.

replies.body: Looks like an agent was able to respond before I got to this post, but do let me know if you're still having any issues redeeming that code ^_^!
